name: Sharded (LazyGames)
description:
You are a shard boy trying to get through levels without dying on lasers or shardy spikes. Collect as many shards as possible on the way by shooting them.

This game is a prototype created in one week.

Source code available here:
https://github.com/mitjaimmonen/ThePerilousAdventuresOfTheCowardlyLamp

Creator: Mitja Immonen
